title: Evolution and Application of Competency-Based Education Approaches: A Case Analysis of Latin America

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of university education systems, professional fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with competency measurement through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles and evolutionary process of competency-based education models.
Learners can analyze major challenges encountered when applying competency-based approaches in higher education.
Learners can assess the implementation status of competencies in educational settings using document analysis and survey methods.
Learners can design mobile-based microlearning strategies in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
